description.zh-cn: 法国卡佩王朝国王（1180年—1223年在位），第一位自称“法兰西国王”的君主。因其谋略与政治手腕，法国在他统治之下成为欧洲最强大的国家之一。
description.en: King of France from the House of Capet (reigned 1180–1223), the first monarch to style himself "King of France". Due to his strategy and political skill, France became one of the most powerful countries in Europe under his rule.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西国王，腓力二世的父亲。
description.en: King of France, father of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西王后，路易七世的第三任妻子，腓力二世的母亲。
description.en: Queen of France, the third wife of Louis VII and mother of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西王后，腓力二世的第一任妻子。
description.en: Queen of France, the first wife of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西王后，腓力二世的第二任妻子。
description.en: Queen of France, the second wife of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西王后，腓力二世的第三任妻子。
description.en: Queen of France, the third wife of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西国王，腓力二世的儿子和继承人。
description.en: King of France, son and successor of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 统治法兰西王国的一个王朝，由雨果·卡佩建立。
description.en: A dynasty that ruled the Kingdom of France, founded by Hugh Capet.

description.zh-cn: 位于西欧的国家，由腓力二世统治时期开始正式使用“法兰西国王”作为君主头衔，取代了“法兰克国王”。
description.en: A country in Western Europe. During the reign of Philip II, the title "King of France" officially replaced "King of the Franks".

description.zh-cn: 日耳曼部落，建立了法兰克王国。在腓力二世之前，法国君主使用“法兰克国王”头衔。
description.en: A Germanic tribe that established the Kingdom of the Franks. Before Philip II, French monarchs used the title "King of the Franks".

description.zh-cn: 12至15世纪统治英格兰的王朝，因在法国拥有大量领地而与卡佩王朝长期斗争。
description.en: A royal house that ruled England from the 12th to the 15th century, which was in long-term conflict with the House of Capet due to its extensive territories in France.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰国王，金雀花王朝的创建者，与腓力二世的父亲路易七世及腓力二世本人均有冲突。
description.en: King of England, founder of the Plantagenet dynasty, who had conflicts with both Philip II and his father, Louis VII.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰国王，亨利二世之子。曾与腓力二世一同参与第三次十字军东征，但两人关系紧张，后成为敌人。
description.en: King of England, son of Henry II. He participated in the Third Crusade with Philip II, but their relationship was tense and they later became enemies.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰国王，亨利二世幼子，理查一世的弟弟。在与腓力二世的战争中失去了金雀花王朝在法国的大部分领地。
description.en: King of England, youngest son of Henry II and brother of Richard I. He lost most of the Plantagenet dynasty's French territories in the war against Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 1214年发生于佛兰德地区的一场关键战役，腓力二世领导的法军击败了神圣罗马帝国与英格兰的联军，确立了法国在欧洲的强国地位。
description.en: A pivotal battle fought in Flanders in 1214, where the French army led by Philip II defeated the allied forces of the Holy Roman Empire and England, establishing France's position as a major power in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 中世纪欧洲的政治实体，在布汶战役中与英格兰结盟对抗法国。
description.en: A political entity in medieval Europe that allied with England against France in the Battle of Bouvines.

description.zh-cn: 对金雀花王朝在12世纪和13世纪统治的领地的统称，包括英格兰和法国西部的大片地区。在布汶战役中与神圣罗马帝国结盟。
description.en: A collective term for the realms of the Plantagenets during the 12th and 13th centuries, including England and large parts of western France. It allied with the Holy Roman Empire in the Battle of Bouvines.

description.zh-cn: 法国的一个市镇，是腓力二世的出生地。
description.en: A commune in France, the birthplace of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 法国的一个市镇，是腓力二世的逝世地。
description.en: A commune in France, the place of death of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 香槟伯爵，腓力二世的舅父，在腓力二世即位初期担任摄政之一，后与腓力二世对立。
description.en: Count of Champagne, uncle of Philip II, who served as one of the regents during Philip's early reign and later opposed him.

description.zh-cn: 兰斯大主教，腓力二世的舅父，在腓力二世即位初期担任摄政之一，后与腓力二世对立。
description.en: Archbishop of Reims, uncle of Philip II, who served as one of the regents during Philip's early reign and later opposed him.

description.zh-cn: 布卢瓦和沙特尔伯爵，腓力二世的舅父，在腓力二世即位初期担任摄政之一，后与腓力二世对立。
description.en: Count of Blois and Chartres, uncle of Philip II, who served as one of the regents during Philip's early reign and later opposed him.

description.zh-cn: 佛兰德伯爵，曾与香槟家族联合发起反对腓力二世的战争。
description.en: Count of Flanders, who allied with the House of Champagne to wage war against Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 由欧洲三位主要君主（腓力二世、理查一世、腓特烈一世）领导的旨在收复圣地的军事行动。
description.en: A military campaign led by three major European monarchs (Philip II, Richard I, Frederick I) aimed at reconquering the Holy Land.

nodes.id: 腓特烈一世 (神圣罗马帝国)

zh-cn: 腓特烈一世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝，第三次十字军东征的领袖之一。
description.en: Holy Roman Emperor, one of the leaders of the Third Crusade.

description.zh-cn: 埃及和叙利亚的苏丹，阿尤布王朝的建立者，第三次十字军东征中穆斯林军队的领袖。
description.en: Sultan of Egypt and Syria and the founder of the Ayyubid dynasty, leader of the Muslim forces during the Third Crusade.

nodes.id: 亨利六世 (神圣罗马帝国)

zh-cn: 亨利六世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝，腓力二世在反对理查一世问题上的重要盟友。
description.en: Holy Roman Emperor, an important ally of Philip II in their opposition to Richard I.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利公爵，亨利六世的封臣，在第三次十字军东征后俘虏了理查一世。
description.en: Duke of Austria, a vassal of Henry VI, who captured Richard I after the Third Crusade.

description.zh-cn: 指12世纪和13世纪法国卡佩王朝与统治英格兰的金雀花王朝之间的一系列冲突。
description.en: Refers to a series of conflicts between the French House of Capet and the English House of Plantagenet during the 12th and 13th centuries.

zh-cn: 布列塔尼公爵阿尔蒂尔一世

description.zh-cn: 布列塔尼公爵，约翰国王的侄子，对英格兰王位有继承权。曾与腓力二世结盟对抗约翰，后被约翰俘虏并杀害。
description.en: Duke of Brittany, nephew of King John, with a claim to the English throne. He allied with Philip II against John, but was later captured and killed by John.

nodes.id: 奥托四世 (神圣罗马帝国)

zh-cn: 奥托四世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝，与英格兰国王约翰结盟对抗腓力二世，在布汶战役中战败。
description.en: Holy Roman Emperor, who allied with King John of England against Philip II and was defeated at the Battle of Bouvines.

description.zh-cn: 罗马教宗，在位期间是教廷权力的顶峰。他曾孤立神圣罗马皇帝奥托四世。
description.en: Pope of Rome, whose pontificate represented the peak of papal power. He isolated the Holy Roman Emperor Otto IV.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲最古老的大学之一，其成立在1200年获得了腓力二世的正式批准。
description.en: One of the oldest universities in Europe, whose establishment was formally approved by Philip II in 1200.

description.zh-cn: 位于巴黎市中心的世界著名博物馆，其前身是腓力二世于约1200年建立的一座城堡。
description.en: A world-famous museum in the center of Paris, its predecessor was a castle built by Philip II around 1200.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世是路易七世的儿子。
description.en: Philip II was the son of Louis VII.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世是香槟的阿黛勒的儿子。
description.en: Philip II was the son of Adela of Champagne.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世于1180年4月28日与埃诺的伊莎贝尔结婚。
description.en: Philip II married Isabella of Hainault on April 28, 1180.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世于1193年与丹麦的英格堡结婚。
description.en: Philip II married Ingeborg of Denmark in 1193.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世于1196年与梅拉涅的阿格尼丝结婚。
description.en: Philip II married Agnes of Merania in 1196.

description.zh-cn: 路易八世是腓力二世的儿子。
description.en: Louis VIII was the son of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 路易八世是埃诺的伊莎贝尔的儿子。
description.en: Louis VIII was the son of Isabella of Hainault.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世出生于戈内斯。
description.en: Philip II was born in Gonesse.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世是卡佩王朝的国王。
description.en: Philip II was a king of the House of Capet.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世即位时继承的头衔是“法兰克国王”。
description.en: The title Philip II inherited upon his accession was "King of the Franks".

description.zh-cn: 从1190年起，腓力二世开始使用“法兰西国王”的头衔。
description.en: From 1190 onwards, Philip II began to use the title "King of France".

description.zh-cn: 路易八世在腓力二世去世后继承了法兰西王位。
description.en: Louis VIII succeeded to the throne of France after the death of Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世在路易七世去世后成为法兰西唯一的国王。
description.en: Philip II became the sole king of France after the death of Louis VII.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世与统治英格兰的金雀花王朝进行了长期的战争。
description.en: Philip II engaged in a long war with the Plantagenet dynasty, which ruled England.

description.zh-cn: 为削弱亨利二世的势力，腓力二世竭力挑拨他与儿子们之间的关系。
description.en: To weaken the power of Henry II, Philip II did his utmost to stir up trouble between him and his sons.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世与理查一世在第三次十字军东征期间矛盾明显，之后腓力二世积极策划打击理查。
description.en: The conflict between Philip II and Richard I was evident during the Third Crusade, and afterwards, Philip actively plotted against Richard.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世反对约翰国王，并最终夺取了金雀花王朝在法国的大部分领地。
description.en: Philip II opposed King John and eventually seized most of the Plantagenet territories in France.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世在其统治初期致力于摆脱包括其舅父香槟伯爵亨利一世在内的摄政的束缚，后者也联合他人发起反对腓力二世的战争。
description.en: In his early reign, Philip II worked to free himself from the control of his regents, including his uncle Henry I, Count of Champagne, who also allied with others to wage war against Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 佛兰德伯爵阿尔萨斯的菲利普曾与香槟家族联合，发起一场反对腓力二世的战争。
description.en: Philip, Count of Flanders, allied with the House of Champagne to wage a war against Philip II.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世支持理查和约翰在亨利二世晚年发动的叛乱。
description.en: Philip II supported the rebellions of Richard and John during the later years of Henry II's reign.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世支持理查和约翰在亨利二世晚年发动的叛乱。
description.en: Philip II supported the rebellions of Richard and John during the later years of Henry II's reign.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世是第三次十字军东征的领袖之一，于1191年返回法兰西。
description.en: Philip II was one of the leaders of the Third Crusade, returning to France in 1191.

description.zh-cn: 理查一世是第三次十字军东征的领袖之一。
description.en: Richard I was one of the leaders of the Third Crusade.

relationships.source: 腓特烈一世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 腓特烈一世是第三次十字军东征的领袖之一。
description.en: Frederick I was one of the leaders of the Third Crusade.

description.zh-cn: 布汶战役的胜利让法国一跃成为欧洲第一强国。
description.en: The victory at the Battle of Bouvines made France the foremost power in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 布汶战役标志着法兰西取代神圣罗马帝国成为欧洲大陆上最主要的国家。
description.en: The Battle of Bouvines marked France's replacement of the Holy Roman Empire as the most dominant power on the European continent.

description.zh-cn: 约翰于1203年俘虏了其侄子阿尔蒂尔一世，并据信下令将其杀害。
description.en: John captured his nephew Arthur I in 1203 and is believed to have ordered his murder.

relationships.target: 奥托四世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 约翰与神圣罗马帝国皇帝奥托四世结盟，约定从东西夹击腓力二世的法兰西王国。
description.en: John allied with Holy Roman Emperor Otto IV, agreeing to attack Philip II's Kingdom of France from the east and west.

relationships.target: 亨利六世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝亨利六世是腓力二世的重要盟友，他们在反对理查一世的问题上意见一致。
description.en: Holy Roman Emperor Henry VI was an important ally of Philip II, as they were in agreement on their opposition to Richard I.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利公爵利奥波德五世在理查一世从十字军东征返回途中将其俘虏。
description.en: Leopold V, Duke of Austria, captured Richard I on his way back from the Crusade.

relationships.target: 亨利六世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 奥地利公爵利奥波德五世是神圣罗马帝国皇帝亨利六世的封臣。
description.en: Leopold V, Duke of Austria, was a vassal of the Holy Roman Emperor Henry VI.

relationships.target: 奥托四世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝奥托四世受到教宗英诺森三世的孤立。
description.en: The Holy Roman Emperor Otto IV was isolated by Pope Innocent III.

description.zh-cn: 约在1200年，腓力二世在巴黎建立了一座方形城堡，这座城堡后来成为卢浮宫的前身。
description.en: Around 1200, Philip II built a square castle in Paris, which later became the precursor to the Louvre Palace.

description.zh-cn: 腓力二世于1200年正式批准了巴黎大学的成立。
description.en: Philip II formally approved the establishment of the University of Paris in 1200.
